title: Aster's Forest Grotto

:root {

    --header-title: "Aster's Forest Grotto";

}
#page-title {display: none;}
.twopanel {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: row wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
}
.bit {
    flex-basis: 48%;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 768px) {
    .twopanel {flex-direction: row-reverse;}
    .bit {flex-basis: 100%;}
}

+++ About the Author 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Hello! I'm ##purple|Aster##, most famously known for being a member of Discord Critique Staff and being a fan of all things flora and fauna (specifically deer). I usually write character stories, stories with religious themes/references, and stories with a heavy focus on nature and the natural world. I spend most of my time in the writing channels of 19cord, so if you see me around don't be afraid to say hi!

**Author Will** 
In the event I suddenly and completely disappear from SCP spaces for more than 6 months, I entrust all my solo pieces (assuming they're not part of a series) to the community, all my collabs to the coauthors, and all my ArtEx gifts to my giftees. 

[[*user FlyPurgatorio]] has my personal email if there is any need to contact me.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
